result.arabic_text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُم مِّن طِينٖ ثُمَّ قَضَىٰٓ أَجَلٗاۖ وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمًّى عِندَهُۥۖ ثُمَّ أَنتُمۡ تَمۡتَرُونَ
result.translation: 2. Yalla kinni sin abba Aadam kallak gintem isin kay Samadak Anuk, tohuk lakal isin addunyal sugtoonu waytaanah gide mekleh, aka waktiy (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) yimixxigeeh kay xaqul muggaqsime mekleh, tohuk lakal isin Rabteenik lakal Yalli sin ugusuwaamah dudda leemit agaywaagittaanah.
